```{r echo=FALSE}
dados<-1:6
dado<-function(n){
  mean(sample(dados,n,T))
}
plot(sapply(1:1000,dado),type='l',col='blue')
abline(h=3.5, lwd=2, lty=2,col='red')
sapply(1:10,dado)
mean(dados)
```





```{r echo=FALSE}
x<-round(rnorm(1000,150,2),0)
n=3000
y<-sample(x,n,T)
hist(y)
abline(v=mean(x),lwd=3,lty=2,col=2)
abline(v=mean(y),lwd=3,lty=2,col=4)
```
